entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Blowing snow before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
